notes: Merzlikins exited and did not return to Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game versus the Senators.
Doughty did not play in Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game against the Rangers.
Kuemper did not return to Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game versus the Rangers.

Cirelli did not return to Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game versus the Sharks due to an undisclosed issue, and HC Jon Cooper didn't have an update on the center's status after the game, as per Eduardo A. Encina of the Tampa Bay Times.
Kesselring did not play in Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game versus the Predators.
Texier did not play in Tuesday's (Jan. 20) game versus the Wild.

Burakovsky did not play in Monday's (Jan. 19) game versus the Jets.

Andersson did not play in Monday's (Jan. 19) game against the Flyers.

Abols is expected to be sidelined for months according to head coach Rick Tocchet, but could still return this season, as per Kevin Kurz of The Athletic.
